subject: Track and Field
Doping (Sports)
Olympic Games (2012)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The controversial history of the long-held East German record in the women’s 4x100-meter relay complicated the reaction to the Americans’ historic achievement on Friday.
snippet: The controversial history of the long-held East German record in the women’s 4x100-meter relay complicated the reaction to the Americans’ historic achievement on Friday.
